text: "Little L" is a 2001 song by English funk band Jamiroquai. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album A Funk Odyssey. It went to number 1 in Spain, number 2 in Italy, number 5 in Finland, Portugal and the United States, number 6 in Hungary and Scotland, number 7 in Canada, number 14 in Australia, number 16 in Ireland, number 17 in Switzerland, number 20 in Norway and number 22 in France. ==Track listings== UK CD single # "Little L" (single edit) # "Little L" (Wounded Buffalo remix) # "Little L" (Bob Sinclar remix) # "Little L" (Boris Dlugosch mix) # "Little L" (video) UK 12-inch single :A1. "Little L" (single edit) :A2. "Little L" (Wounded Buffalo remix) :B1. "Little L" (Bob Sinclar remix) :B2. "Little L" (Boris Dlugosch mix) UK cassette single # "Little L" (single edit) # "Little L" (Wounded Buffalo remix) Australian CD single # "Little L" (single edit) # "Little L" (Bob Sinclar remix) – 7:26 # "Little L" (Boris Dlugosch mix) # "Little L" (Boris Dlugosch dub) US CD single # "Little L" (single edit) – 3:57 # "Little L" (Bob Sinclair remix) – 7:26 # "Little L" (Boris Dlugosch mix) – 6:14 # "Little L" (Blaze Shelter mix) – 6:18 # "You Give Me Something" (Full Intention club mix) – 7:11 ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:Jamiroquai songs
